attributes.title: Wow.
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to get current information about our president and current statues of his campaign as well as to see if I could obtain information about his next rally. INSTEAD this app jacked my phone and is a horrible data mining app! This app not only crashed my phone everything I opened the app but when I tried to delete it, when I turned my phone on and if I went into Facebook! This app was draining my battery by the second! It hacked into my other apps like Snapchat and Facebook and Twitter and deleted all of my accounts and deleted all of my photos! This app was trying to get information about where I live, what my job is, what blood type I have, who my family is, what news sights I get information from, who I follow, who I block, where my dog went to get neutered, where I eat on Wednesdays after church, a muffin recipe so I can then put my muffins in the freezer, it stole my homemade cake recipe and sent it to all of my contacts and blocked contacts! This app is horrible and is the worse app I have ever laid eyes on and that says a lot since I downloaded an app that monitors my bowel movement schedule. This app is atrocious and should be taken down IMMEDIATELY!
